description: Rumble is the main protagonist of the Tales of Rumble, the game derived from the "original" Gintama game, revised by http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama] with http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki]`s guidance. In game, Rumble came to Edo, joined http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Odd Jobs] and was supposed to rescue the kidnapped princess with the them.
name: Rambu
